億ション: (okushon) - apartamento com custo de 100 milhões de ienes ou mais, apartamento de luxo
億万長者: (おくまんちょうじゃ) - billionaire; multimillionaire; very rich person
億兆: (おくちょう) - the people; multitude; masses
儒艮: (ジュゴン) - dugong (Dugong dugon); sea pig
儒良: (ジュゴン) - dugong (Dugong dugon); sea pig
儘: (じん) - Como é, como é, como se gosta, porque, como; condição, estado
儘ならない: (ままならない) - unable to have one's way with
儘に: (ままに) - as (e.g. "do as one is told", "as we age we gain wisdom"); wherever (e.g. "wherever my fancy took me")
儘よ: (ままよ) - whatever; never mind; I don't care; the hell with it
儚くなる: (はかなくなる) - to die; to pass away
儚む: (はかなむ) - to despair of; to see the vanity of
償う: (つぐなう) - to make up for; to recompense; to redeem (one's faults); to compensate for; to indemnify; to atone for
償却: (しょうきゃく) - repayment/redemption; depreciation; amortization/amortisation
償還: (しょうかん) - repayment; redemption; amortization; amortisation
償還期間: (しょうかんきかん) - redemption period; repayment term
償還義務者: (しょうかんぎむしゃ) - guarantor (of a payment)
償金を懸ける: (しょうきんをかける) - to offer a prize
優々閑々: (ゆうゆうかんかん) - (yoji) composed and unhurried; easygoing and leisurely; in indolence
優しい: (やさしい) - tender; kind; gentle; graceful; affectionate; amiable
優しくする: (やさしくする) - to be kind to; to treat kindly
優る: (まさる) - to excel/to surpass/to exceed/to have an edge/to be superior/to outrival; to outweigh/to preponderate
優るとも劣らない: (まさるともおとらない) - not at all inferior to; rival or surpass; compare favorably (with)
優るとも劣らぬ: (まさるともおとらぬ) - not at all inferior to; rival or surpass; compare favorably (with)
優れて: (すぐれて) - exceedingly; conspicuously; by far
優れる: (すぐれる) - to surpass; to outstrip; to excel
優れ物: (すぐれもの) - exceptional item; extraordinary product
優位に立つ: (ゆういにたつ) - to dominate; to prevail; to be superior to; to get ahead of; to get the upper hand
優優閑閑: (ゆうゆうかんかん) - (yoji) composed and unhurried; easygoing and leisurely; in indolence
優先リンクセット: (ゆうせんリンクセット) - priority link set
優先使用語: (ゆうせんしようご) - preferred term
優先取り組み物質: (ゆうせんとりくみぶっしつ) - substances requiring priority action (with regard to environmental issues); priority substance
優先取組物質: (ゆうせんとりくみぶっしつ) - substances requiring priority action (with regard to environmental issues); priority substance
優先外貨: (ゆうせんがいか) - preferred foreign currency
優先席: (ゆうせんせき) - priority seat; courtesy seat; seat provided in trains, buses, etc. for the use of the disabled, young children, the elderly, pregnant women, etc.
優先度: (ゆうせんど) - degree of relative priority
優先扱い: (ゆうせんあつかい) - priority treatment; preferential treatment
優先株: (ゆうせんかぶ) - preferred stock; preference shares
優先株主: (ゆうせんかぶぬし) - holder of preferred stock
優先権: (ゆうせんけん) - priority; preference; preferential right
優先順位: (ゆうせんじゅんい) - priority; order of precedence
優先Ｎサービスデータ単位: (ゆうせんエンサービスデータたんい) - expedited (N)-service-data-unit; (N)-expedited-data-unit
優劣: (ゆうれつ) - (relative) merits; superiority or inferiority; quality
優劣つけがたい: (ゆうれつつけがたい) - it's hard to choose (because both are excellent)
優劣の法則: (ゆうれつのほうそく) - (Mendel's) law of dominance
優勝を争う: (ゆうしょうをあらそう) - to contend for victory
優勝テープ: (ゆうしょうテープ) - finish line tape
優勝争い: (ゆうしょうあらそい) - championship race; struggle for victory
優勝候補: (ゆうしょうこうほ) - favorite (top choice) for the championship (favourite); best bet for the title
優勝劣敗: (ゆうしょうれっぱい) - (yoji) survival of the fittest
優勝戦: (ゆうしょうせん) - championship tournament; finals
優勝決定戦: (ゆうしょうけっていせん) - deciding match (in a competition for a cup (pennant))
優勝者: (ゆうしょうしゃ) - prize winner; pennant winner; victor
優勝額: (ゆうしょうがく) - {sumo} portrait of a tournament winner
優勢: (ゆうせい) - (ant: 劣勢) superiority; superior power; predominance; preponderance
優勢勝ち: (ゆうせいがち) - winning by judges' decision (in judo)
優女: (ゆうじょ) - gentle woman/affectionate woman; (ゆうじょ only) beautiful graceful woman
優婆塞: (うばそく) - upasaka (devout male lay follower of Buddhism)
優婆夷: (うばい) - upasika (devout female lay follower of Buddhism)
